title: Pierre-Auguste Renoir Two Sisters (On the Terrace) Mug
description:
Mug developed from Pierre-Auguste Renoir’s Two Sisters (On the Terrace), 1881, from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

Pair your coffee or tea with our mug featuring a detail from Two Sisters (On the Terrace.), or consider sharing this as a gift with a friend.

  • Dimensions: 3.2 x 3.75 in.
  • Size: 11oz.
  • Material: Ceramic
  • Care Instructions: Dishwasher and microwave safe.
